## [Go: Easy set up for R courses from ITS](https://github.com/ITSLeeds/go)  <a href='https://github.com/ITSLeeds/go'><img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ITSLeeds/go/master/logo.jpg' align="right" height=180/></a>
